title: The Matriarch Directly Download
description: From 2 to 8 players, The Matriarch is a deadly hide & seek party game where everyone is an imposter. It mixes social guessing with hide-and-seek mechanics and causes Paranoia in all players involved BOTs are just programmed to complete their tasks, from milking cows to harvesting potatoes, they don’t question the Matriarch’s orders Accounting+

system_requirements.Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
